widgetTypes.name: RPC debug terminal
widgetTypes.description: Allows to send any RPC command using it's name and parameters to device. Useful for debug.

widgetTypes.name: RPC remote shell
widgetTypes.description: Allows to send emulate remote shell. Requires custom implementation on the target device to work properly.

widgetTypes.name: Knob Control
widgetTypes.description: Sends the command to device with specified value each time user changes the value. Uses 'setValue' and 'getValue' RPC calls by default. The name of the RPC calls is configurable in advanced settings.

widgetTypes.name: Switch Control
widgetTypes.description: Allows to send the RPC call to device when user toggle the switch. Advanced widget settings allow you to configure how to fetch the initial value of the switch.

widgetTypes.name: Round switch
widgetTypes.description: Allows to send the RPC call to device when user toggle the switch. Advanced widget settings allow you to configure how to fetch the initial value of the switch.

widgetTypes.name: Led indicator
widgetTypes.description: Visualize the state of the device. Fetches the value from device using RPC or using attribute subscription.

widgetTypes.name: RPC Button
widgetTypes.description: Allows to send RPC command when user press the button.

descriptor.templateHtml:
{{title}}

widgetTypes.name: Update device attribute
widgetTypes.description: Allows to send shared attribute update when user press the button.
